pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Juuga VS Kamen Rider Orteca (2023, web series)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:revice/devices/demons_driver_orteca)Demons Driver (Orteca)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed III$(li)Resistance II$(li)Water Breathing$(li)Strength II
